Dialogue.0: You grab a corner table and camp out in the bar for a couple of hours: eating, drinking, conversing with all manner of folk.
Dialogue.2: In fact, it reminds you why you love this place so much, that you'd stay even as all the jobs leave.
Dialogue.3: But then that thought makes you depressed.
Dialogue.4: Aaaaand you remember that you actually need to make money, not just sit in a bar all day.
